嵦字的基本解释

嵦
kǎi
山。

嵦
ái
〔崃嵦〕山貌。

嵦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kǎi］
［《集韻》可亥切，上海，溪。］
(1)山貌。
(2)山。
[②]［ái］
［《廣韻》五來切，平咍，疑。］
见“崍嵦”。

嵦字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵦； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页317第22
【廣韻】五來切【集韻】魚開切，?音皚。崍嵦，山貌。　又【五音集韻】可亥切，音塏。義同。

嵦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
嵦字的起名意思

暂无。

嵦
Basic explanation of words
嵦
kǎi
mountain.
嵦
ái
〔Laiying〕 Mountain appearance.
嵦
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kǎi］
["Ji Yun" can be cut, Shanghai, Xi. ]
(1) Mountain appearance.
(2) Mountain.
[②]［ái］
["Guangyun" five cuts, flat 咍, doubt. ]
See "Laiying".
嵦
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵦; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 317 22
[Guang Yun] Five to cut [Ji Yun] The fish is cut open, and the sound is white. Lai 嵦, mountain appearance.　[Pentagram Rhyme] can be cut, sound. The same meaning.
